mapper.select: SELECT s.School, s.SchoolCode AS id, s.Website, s.EstablishedTime, s.Icon, (SELECT u.University FROM universitysheet AS u WHERE s.UniversityCode= u.UniversityCode) AS university FROM schoolsheet AS s WHERE S.School LIKE concat(concat('%',#{keyword}),'%') LIMIT 0 , 10

SELECT SchoolCode AS id, School, EnglishName, UniversityCode, EstablishedTime, Icon, Image, Website, Introduction, Majors, (SELECT u.University FROM universitysheet AS u WHERE s.UniversityCode= u.UniversityCode) AS university FROM schoolsheet AS s WHERE s.School!='' AND s.SchoolCode= #{schoolCode}
